title: Locke and Newton aid Enligtenment thought

content.question:
Directions: Suggested planning and writing time—35 minutes.

Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the ways in which the ideas of seventeenth-century thinkers John Locke and Isaac Newton contributed to the ideas of eighteenth-century Enlightenment thinkers.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
